summary: Hey everyone! There is a pin project going around on Twitter that benefits Taliesin’s chosen charity, First Place for Youth that...
caption:
Hey everyone! There is a pin project going around on Twitter that benefits Taliesin’s chosen charity, First Place for Youth that would be awesome for you all to participate in or at least share on here and on Twitter.

The user is @ HOMArtworks on Twitter (https://twitter.com/HoMArtworks) and it’d be awesome for this to get more support! There are still around half of each pin left, and they’re planning on making a good amount, so the sooner the better. There’s not a whole lot of time left for ordering though, so claim yours before they close orders!

Here (https://twitter.com/HoMArtworks/status/1068395915474481152) is a link to their tweet with additional information for the pin project, such as shipping and breakdown of costs. If you have any questions you can DM them or if you do not have a twitter you can ask me and I’ll relay the info from them to you!

Even if you can’t support, you can help by sharing the posts, both this one and the tweet.

tags: talks machina is a GIFT TO ME PERSONALLY
and Jester's playlist made me rewatch this episode because...I love them
summary: Jester wouldn’t know the actual terminology per se, or think it different because of her experience, but Marion is essentially...
text: Jester wouldn’t know the actual terminology per se, or think it different because of her experience, but Marion is essentially agoraphobic. Her place of work is her home as well, and she doesn’t really go out, either. Jester probably got out more, growing up, doing these errands for her mom because she wouldn’t go out. It’s been very much a closed, protected, you know- ‘this is our space for you and me, and here we’re safe and we love each other and we have this together.’ And was it probably the best scenario as a child? No, but no parent is perfect, and Marion has her regrets as well, I’m sure. But she’s also proud to see the woman Jester is becoming, and in many ways excited to see that she’s kind of, ascending past a number of personal barriers that Marion herself has dealt with over the years.
source: Matthew Mercer in the Talks Machina episode for ‘Encroaching Waters’

reblog.comment: Matthew Mercer in the Talks Machina episode for ‘Encroaching Waters’

blog.name: yashanydrooniin

blog.description: 💙vex and percy invented love💙icon

summary:
life-love-and-lotr
 replied to your post  “send me cassandra de rolo or perc'ahlia headcanons or just anything...”
             ...
body:
life-love-and-lotr replied to your post “send me cassandra de rolo or perc'ahlia headcanons or just anything…”
Cassandra is the person who is the most comfort to Vex after she loses Vax. Having lost most of her family, it felt natural to be there for her. They had many discussions about greif and loss and how you cope with it. They became very close

yes! i love this so much! also if you want to keep sending me headcanons i am n e v e r opposed to them
